definitions.title: prep.
definitions.body: before (so OAram. Nab. Palm. etc. (Lzb:360 f.), Targum [[קָדָם]], Syr. qdom; prop. a subst. the front, cf. Ar. qud=a0m the front; for √ v. BH [[קדם]]);—sf. [[קָדָמַי]] Da 2:9 +, [[מָָי]]- v:Da 2:6; [[קדמיך]] Kt, [[קֳדָמָךְ]] Qr, † Da 5:23, Da 6:23; [[קֳדָמוֹהִי]] Da 4:5 + (cf. Nerab [[קדמוה]], Cooke:189); 3 fs. [[קדמיה]] Kt, [[קֳדָמַהּ]] Qr, † Da 7:7, Da 7:8, Da 7:20; [[קֳדָמֵיהוֹן]] † Da 4:4;—

before (= Heb. [[לפְנֵי]]), esp. in the phrases to answer, pray, say, etc., before a superior (as more respectful than to), Da 2:9 [[לְמֵאמַד קֳדָמַי]], v:Da 2:10, v:Da 2:11, v:Da 2:27, Da 6:11 (v. Dr), v:Da 6:12, v:Da 6:13, v:Da 6:14; ´[[קֱרִי ק]]: Ezr 4:18, Ezr 4:23, Ezr 5:23, 5:23; with [[שְׁפַר]] to seem fair Da 3:32, Da 6:2; after vbs. of motion, in before, Da 2:24, Da 2:25, Da 3:13, Da 4:3 +; of time Da 7:7. †

[[מִן־קֳדָם]] from before ( = [[מִלִּפְנֵי]], but as used in late Heb., Es 1:19, Es 4:8: p. 818a), c. [[קַבֵּל]] Da 2:6, [[בְּעָא]] v:Da 2:18; of a decree, Da 6:27 [[מִן־קֳדָמִי]] [[שִׁׂים טְעֵם]] (‖[[מִנִּי ]] Da 3:29 +), cf. Da 2:15, Ezr 7:14; of God, Da 5:24 [[מִן־קֳדָמוֹהִי שְׁלִיחַ פַּסָּא דַּי־יְדָא]], Da 7:10 (so very oft. in Targum, Dr:Sm lxx. f. lxxiii). Also = Heb. [[מִפְּנֵי]], with to fear Da 5:19, Da 6:27, be rooted up Da 7:8, fall v:Da 7:20.
